whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on the user's device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when visiting a website. Cookies allow the website to remember user preferences and improve the browsing experience. Most browsers automatically accept cookies, but it is possible to modify browser settings to reject them.

technical.title: Technical Cookies (Necessary)
technical.content: These cookies are essential for the website's operation and cannot be disabled. They are used exclusively for:
list: Storing the language preference selected by the user (Italian/English)
Ensuring the correct functioning of basic website features
technical.note: These cookies do not collect information that personally identifies the user and are strictly necessary to provide the requested service.

analytical.title: Analytical Cookies (Optional)
analytical.content: The website may use anonymized analytical cookies to collect aggregated information on how users use the site. This data is used exclusively for:
list: Understanding which sections are most visited
analytical.note: The analytical cookies used are configured to be anonymized and do not allow personal identification of users. Such data is aggregated and used only for statistical purposes.

profiling.title: Profiling Cookies
profiling.content: MaBa Consulting S.r.l. a Socio Unico does NOT use profiling cookies for advertising purposes or to create user profiles. The website is oriented toward providing professional information and does not require personalized tracking for marketing purposes.

consent.title: Consent Management
consent.content: For technical cookies, consent is not required as they are strictly necessary for the website's operation. For optional analytical cookies, if present, consent can be managed through browser settings or any consent banners present on the website.
consent.withdraw: You can revoke or modify your consent at any time by changing your browser settings or by contacting MaBa Consulting S.r.l. a Socio Unico at the email address indicated in the Contact section.
